definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
"silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
flat/(coll.) to beat (sb) up/old variant of 匾[bian3]
to establish (a unit or department)/staffing structure (excluding temporary and casual staff)
to weave/to plait/to compile/to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
to establish (a unit or department)/staffing structure (excluding temporary and casual staff)
to weave/to plait/to compile/to put together (a lesson plan, budget etc)
to translate and edit/translator-editor/(computing) to compile (source code)
editor in charge (abbr. for 責任編輯|责任编辑[ze2 ren4 bian1 ji2])
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
to weave/to knit/to plait/to braid/(fig.) to create (sth abstract, e.g. a dream, a lie etc)

sentences.english: My grandma is very good at weaving baskets with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 我的艿艿十分擅长用竹子编篮筐。

sentences.english: This dictionary is compiled by a famous linguist.
sentences.chinese: 这本词典是一位著名的语言学家编篡的。

sentences.english: We've planning out an English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在准备编一部英汉字典。

sentences.english: He improvised a poem at the evening party.
sentences.chinese: 他在晚会上现编了一首诗。
编篮子这一行已逐渐衰弱。

sentences.english: This is the jingle that people writes to me.
sentences.chinese: 这是人们给我编的顺口溜。

sentences.english: John didn't have a good excuse for his absence so he made up one.
sentences.chinese: 约翰无故缺席，因此他编了一个理由。

sentences.english: Are you any good at making uy stories for children ?
sentences.chinese: 你擅长给孩子们编故事吗？

sentences.english: The jasmine wreath that you wove me thrills to my heart like praise.
sentences.chinese: 你给我编的茉莉花环使我心震颤，像是受了赞扬。

sentences.english: Or, at least a series of foods that have previously been programmed into the machine.
sentences.chinese: 或者，至少是那些被预先编到机器程序里的食物。

sentences.english: Let me menu the travel schedule for next week.
sentences.chinese: 让我来编下周的旅行安排。

sentences.english: Office facilities is made up change mechanism administration to make up general need to attend officeholder exam.
sentences.chinese: 机关事业编改成机关行政编一般需要参加公务员考试。

sentences.english: Office facilities is made up change mechanism administration to make up general need to attend officeholder exam.
sentences.chinese: 机关事业编改成机关行政编一般需要参加公务员考试。

sentences.english: A belt straw and ivy buds.
sentences.chinese: 麦草和长春藤花蕾编的腰带。

sentences.english: Use all the sentences you've learned to make a conversation and write down.
sentences.chinese: 用所有学过的句型编一个对话并写下来。

definition: to gather up/to collect/to edit/to compile
editor or creator of online content (diminutive term, often used to refer to oneself: I, me, this writer)
the current period/this term (usually in finance)
